option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/about_us.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.AboutUsController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="DoseIn" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-button-active" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<center> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="600.0" spacing="15" styleClass="about-root"> <!-- About Us Card --> <VBox fx:id="aboutCard" alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="462.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="15.0" styleClass="about-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="18.0" left="30.0" right="30.0" top="50.0" /> </padding>
<!-- Team Heading --> <Label styleClass="team-heading" text="TEAM MOMENTUM" />
<!-- Team Image --> <ImageView fitWidth="300" preserveRatio="true" styleClass="team-image"> <Image url="@../images/team.png" /> </ImageView>
<!-- Team Members --> <Label alignment="CENTER" maxWidth="500" styleClass="team-members" text="Md. Majharul Islam || Md. Rijwan Kabir || Md. Obeduzzaman || Banna Rani Sarkar || Md. A. Barik Sarkar" textAlignment="CENTER" wrapText="true" />
<!-- Contact Section --> <VBox spacing="5" styleClass="contact-section"> <Label styleClass="contact-label" text="Contact us at:" /> <Label styleClass="contact-email" text="teammomentum@gmail.com" /> </VBox>
<!-- Department and University --> <Label alignment="CENTER" maxWidth="500" styleClass="department-info" text="Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Daffodil International University, Bangladesh" textAlignment="CENTER" wrapText="true" /> </VBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/about_us.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.AboutUsController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="DoseIn" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-button-active" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<center> <VBox alignment="CENTER" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="600.0" spacing="15" styleClass="about-root"> <!-- About Us Card --> <VBox fx:id="aboutCard" alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="462.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="15.0" styleClass="about-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="18.0" left="30.0" right="30.0" top="50.0" /> </padding>
<!-- Team Heading --> <Label styleClass="team-heading" text="TEAM MOMENTUM" />
<!-- Team Image --> <ImageView fitWidth="300" preserveRatio="true" styleClass="team-image"> <Image url="@../images/team.png" /> </ImageView>
<!-- Team Members --> <Label alignment="CENTER" maxWidth="500" styleClass="team-members" text="Md. Majharul Islam || Md. Rijwan Kabir || Md. Obeduzzaman || Banna Rani Sarkar || Md. A. Barik Sarkar" textAlignment="CENTER" wrapText="true" />
<!-- Contact Section --> <VBox spacing="5" styleClass="contact-section"> <Label styleClass="contact-label" text="Contact us at:" /> <Label styleClass="contact-email" text="teammomentum@gmail.com" /> </VBox>
<!-- Department and University --> <Label alignment="CENTER" maxWidth="500" styleClass="department-info" text="Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Daffodil International University, Bangladesh" textAlignment="CENTER" wrapText="true" /> </VBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>
